content: this pattern is available for free on my blog the downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry includes the full pattern in one printable file without advertisements this triangle scarf is basically a simple two row repeat that is fairly quick and mindless once you get going the main stitch is half_double_crochet with just a few row of triple crochet thrown in for contrast the open and airy stitch pattern works well with the slightly bulky dreamy yarn this download includes a written pattern with pictures pictures are included at the end of the document so you can choose to easily omit those pages when printing difficulty easy - level 2 materials needed 6 5 mm hook one 8 8oz ball of red heart dreamy yarn yarn needle scissors finished dimensions 54 x 24 i hope you enjoy making this pattern please reach out to me via email with any questions
